content.rendered:
Air Nostrum, Líneas Aéreas del Mediterráneo, S.A., also known as Iberia Regional, is a regional airline based in Valencia, Spain. Air Nostrum is an independent carrier which operates as a franchisee of Iberia Airlines and Binter Canarias. It was founded on 1994. Iberia Regional franchise is a regional partner of Iberia and an affiliate member of the Oneworld airline alliance. Air Nostrum operates 91 domestic and international routes to 51 destinations, and charter flights. Its main base is Valencia Airport, with hubs at Barcelona Airport and Madrid-Barajas Airport.

Air Nostrum Address : Avda. Comarques del País Valencià, 2.
46930 Quart de Poblet, Valencia (ESPAÑA – SPAIN)

Phone : +34-96-196.02.00

Fax: +34-96-196.06.29

Air Nostrum Official website : http://www.airnostrum.es/home.asp?idioma=2

Fleet size: 51

  • ATR 72-600
  • Bombardier CRJ200
  • Bombardier CRJ900
  • Bombardier CRJ1000

Air Nostrum Baggage Allowance

Air Nostrum Baggage

View Air Nostrum Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Air Nostrum Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy, Avios

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Nostrum in Valencia, Spain Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Nostrum in Valencia, Spain: (click on the stars below)
